named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDERS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDER_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.id = :orderId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ORDERS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID_AND_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.type = :orderType

named-query.name: BC_UPDATE_CART_ORDER_TO_SUBMITTED
named-query.query: UPDATE org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order blcOrder SET blcOrder.type = 'SUBMITTED' WHERE blcOrder.id = :id

named-query.name: BC_READ_NAMED_ORDER_FOR_CUSTOMER
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId AND order.name = :orderName AND order.type = :orderType
